programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.sub-title: The First and Kennedy Street Crew
programme.desc: Street gang members kill two FBI agents and a detective in Washington, D.C.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: A man who hunted outdoorsmen, killing them with a high-powered rifle, is caught when the FBI receives a tip leading to the murder weapon.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: An unusual ransom note gives authorities clues about a wealthy woman's disappearance.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: FBI agents in Seattle focus on a series of bank robberies.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: A serial killer taunts and hunts his victims before shooting them down.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: A member of the El Rukn gang agrees to cooperate with law enforcement as part of a plea bargain.

programme.title: Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.desc: Jeffery Pyne was every parent's dream in so many ways, so many wonder what drove him to commit the brutal murder of his own mother.

programme.title: Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.desc: Nancy Seaman doesn't denied killing her husband Robert with a hatchet; either she planned it or the murder was a desperate attempt to save her own life after, what she claims, was three decades of physical and emotional abuse.

programme.title: Corrupt Crimes
programme.desc: Fashion designer Rudolph Moshammer is murdered by a male prostitute; musician Tim Lambesis gets caught up in a murder-for-hire plot.

programme.title: Corrupt Crimes
programme.desc: The reckless captain of the Costa Concordia orders his ship off-course, causing it to hit a boulder and capsize; a Japanese cult leader masterminds several terror attacks.

programme.title: Corrupt Crimes
programme.desc: Andrew Cunanan's killing spree ends in the death of fashion icon Gianni Versace; Tyco's top brass pilfers hundreds of millions of dollars through the company.

programme.title: Corrupt Crimes
programme.sub-title: The Stripper Who Became a Murderer
programme.desc: A woman who falsely accused the Duke University men's lacrosse team of rape is charged with the attempted murder of her boyfriend; a trusted employee embezzles $34 million to feed a shopping addiction.

programme.title: Corrupt Crimes
programme.sub-title: Reckless Deaths on a Hollywood Set
programme.desc: A stunt goes horribly wrong, causing three deaths on the set of "Twilight Zone: The Movie"; billionaire hotelier Leona Helmsley is called "the queen of mean."

programme.title: Corrupt Crimes
programme.desc: Though admitting to abusing drugs and stripping for money, Nevada's Kirsten Lobato denies being a killer; a real-life soap opera turns into a twisted, lethal tale.

programme.title: VPI: Vinnie Politan Investigates
programme.desc: Vinnie Politan takes a deep dive into the true crime stories that are captivating the world over.

programme.title: Opening Statements With Julie Grant
programme.desc: Former prosecutor Julie Grant is joined by a team of top trial attorneys and forensic experts to cover the high-stakes trials that are on the docket, and the crime cases dominating the headlines.
